title: Voices Of The Week: The 'Grim Reality' Of The Paris Attack
teaser: We hear perspectives on the Charlie Hebdo attack, from Secretary of State John Kerry, French philosopher Bernard Henri Levy, Conan Obrien, Imam Anjem Choudary and Somali-born writer Ayaan Hirsi Ali.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
